title: Error message after completing games
body: A lot of times, after I complete a game and the client attempts to reopen (I play with it closed while in game to reduce fps drop and lag), I get an error message that says something like "Failed to load URL (url) Error (-7) and i don't know how to fix this issue.

replies.body: Might be a hiccup or instability with your connection that's failing to render assets after transition from the game server back to the client.  Try the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help troubleshoot this!
